snippet.title: [4K] Kingdom Come: Deliverance II Official CGI Trailer – Live a Life Medieval (Full version)
snippet.description:
Experience the highs and lows of Henry's journey in the Official CGI Trailer for Kingdom Come: Deliverance II, where life in 15th-century Bohemia is as unpredictable as it is unforgiving. From the chaos of a brawl to the fleeting joy of celebration, every moment pulls Henry deeper into the challenges of medieval life.
 
Get ready for a story of resilience, danger, and the choices that will shape the next chapter. The journey begins February 4.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance II arrives on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 on February 4, 2025.

Pre-order Now: https://bit.ly/PreorderKCD2

KCD II Social Media:
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/KingdomComeRPG
Facebook: https://facebook.com/kingdomcomerpg  
Instagram: https://instagram.com/kingdomcomerpg  
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kingdomcomerpg

#KCDII #KingdomComeDeliverance #medieval #RPG #Warhorse #PLAION
